thread.title: You’ll NEVER guess what this pilot does for a second job
thread.title_full: You’ll NEVER guess what this pilot does for a second job

title: You’ll NEVER guess what this pilot does for a second job
text:
Hilarious tweets aboard a plane GETTY Bruce Dickson: He is also the lead singer of British rock band Iron Maiden 
Many readers were shocked at this revelation and went on to comment in abundance. 
One person wrote: “I envy people who can get their s*** together in more than one area of their life.” 
Another said: “What a trooper.” 
One Imgur user revealed: “He is also a world class fencer who represented England, and he has written books for kids (I think).” GETTY Bruce Dickinson: According to one Imgur user, Bruce is also a world class fencer 
The story comes after UK airports scrapped security checks for the first time in almost half a century . 
Three Scottish airports have introduced a “streamlined check-in process”, which allows passengers to board without security checks. 
Campbeltown has become the first airport in nearly half a century where security checks haven’t been used on passengers. 
Loganair flight 6844 travelled from the south-west Scotland airport to Glasgow with 15 passengers on board. Related articles
